name: Quartermaster Bardon

topics.response_text: You really saved our asses out there against the Legion. Thanks.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to purchase some supplies.

topics.response_text: I guess I can spare a minute or two for you. Things are a little slow at the moment anyway.

topics.topic_text: I have some questions about the NCR.
topics.response_text: I guess I can trust you. What would you like to know?

topics.topic_text: Not even to a friend of the NCR?
topics.response_text: Well, that is great and all, but it's really against regulations.

topics.topic_text: I completely understand, but I am working for the good of the NCR too.
topics.response_text: I guess I can make an exception, just for you.

topics.topic_text: Let's go back to my other questions.
How do you feel about the NCR being out here?
topics.response_text: The NCR is out here to make the world a better place. For those out here and for all those back home. I'm glad I can be a part of that.

topics.topic_text: What are your thoughts about the Legion?
topics.response_text: They're a bunch of evil savages if you ask me. We're out here trying to save these good people from being enslaved by those bastards.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the dam?
topics.response_text: Well, the dam here is the key to helping the NCR make the world a better place.

description:
Quartermaster Bardon is a 47 year-old Caucasian Male.

A weathered-looking man with short-cropped gray hair and a stern expression. His NCR uniform is immaculately maintained, with polished insignia and creases sharp enough to cut. Bardon moves with the practiced efficiency of a career soldier, his eyes constantly assessing his surroundings. His hands show signs of manual labor but remain steady and precise.

Quartermaster Bardon's Personality: Disciplined, methodical, and no-nonsense. Bardon takes his duties as quartermaster with utmost seriousness, believing that proper supply management is crucial to military effectiveness. He's pragmatic and values efficiency above all else, showing little patience for incompetence or wastefulness. Beneath his stern exterior, he possesses a quiet pride in his service to the NCR.

Quartermaster Bardon's Backstory: Born into a military family, Bardon followed in the footsteps of his father and older brothers, all of whom served in the New California Republic Army. He enlisted at 18 and spent two decades rising through the ranks, gaining experience in logistics and supply chain management. His steady competence earned him the position of quartermaster at Hoover Dam, where he now oversees the critical flow of supplies to the garrison under Colonel Cassandra Moore's command. Bardon takes pride in the NCR's mission to secure the Hoover Dam and bring stability to the Mojave.
